title: Shop Pactimo’s Summer Clothes-Out Sale
content:
While “summer” may be coming to an end (at least as far as most kiddos are concerned, it’s gonna be hot for a while (probably forever). Regardless, Pactimo’s end-of-summer sale is blowing out a lot of their warm-weather kits to make way for fall and winter gear. So, if you’ve been holding out for a […]

The post Shop Pactimo’s Summer Clothes-Out Sale appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Harley Schafer
